page_title: "Redis Provider"
description: |-
  The redis provider allows managing redis acl users ephemerally.
---

# Redis Provider

The provider allows you to handle redis acl users ephemerally.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "redis" {
  address  = "https://redis.example.com"
  username = user
  password = password
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `address` (String) redis address
- `username` (String) redis username
- `password` (String, Sensitive) redis password
